SELECT p.ID, p.CategoryID, p.MemberID, p.Price, p.Qty, p.Title, p.Inserted, p.Address, p.Likes, p.StatusCode, p.views, p.writer, p.body, p.fileName, ph.ProductTitle PhotoTitle
FROM Product p left join ProductPhoto ph on p.id=ph.ProductID ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT p.ID, p.CategoryID, p.MemberID, p.Price, p.Qty, p.Title, p.Inserted, p.Address, p.Likes, p.StatusCode, p.views, p.writer, p.body, p.fileName, ph.ProductTitle PhotoTitle
FROM Product p left join ProductPhoto ph on p.id=ph.ProductID ORDER BY Likes DESC
SELECT p.* FROM Product p JOIN ProductLike pl ON p.id = pl.productId WHERE pl.memberId = #{memberId}

SELECT p.ID, p.CategoryID, p.MemberID, p.Price, p.Qty, p.Title, p.Inserted, p.Address, p.Likes, p.StatusCode, p.views, p.writer, p.body, p.fileName, ph.ProductTitle PhotoTitle
FROM Product p left join ProductPhoto ph on p.id=ph.ProductID ORDER BY ID DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, 12

SELECT count(*) FROM product
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
